Docs.summary: Bit in #flags: If set, the service can be bound and run in the calling application's package, rather than the package in which it is declared.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Bit in #flags: If set, the service will run in its own isolated process.

Docs.summary: Options that have been set in the service declaration in the manifest.

[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Bit in #flags: If set, a single instance of the service will run for all users on the device.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags FlagStopWithTask = (1)

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)]
[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Bit in #flags: If set, the service will automatically be stopped by the system if the user removes a task that is rooted in one of the application's activities.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags FlagUseAppZygote = (8)

[<System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Content.PM.ServiceInfoFlags enum directly instead of this field.", true)>]

Docs.summary: Bit in #flags: If set, the service (which must be isolated) will be spawned from an Application Zygote, instead of the regular Zygote.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
